text: Shin Soo-yeon is a South Korean actress and model. She is known for her roles in dramas such as Hi Bye, Mama!, Graceful Family and The World of the Married. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title !! Role !!
